text: – sajith premadasa nawathath dana gasayi…

oonama ind riyak ho kotasak aak ramanaya kirimata tiyubakal basilasayata puluwani. 1882 ndi robat kok nam waid yawaraya wisin k shaya rogayata hethukarakayawana baktiriyawa wana tiyuwakiyulas basilasa nam k shad ra jiwi wisheshaya soya ganna ladi.
elambaa uthurusaluwa ekas kota dakunu danamandala polowehi hana ee kodhabhakkha yaku wetha andili banda “nidukaneni, mama sak dewindumi.
chinayath ekka giwisum assan kaloth ape ithiri wela thiyena deshiya kamhal tikath wahewi.’
unwahanse jathika hela urumayen iwathata wadama kala bawak prakasha kara naha.
ema waidya sayana pothehi edina waidya nirdesha satahan kara aththe withthikaruge athakurin bawa polis wimarshanawaladi anawaranaya wiya.

danata wandawi yame tharjanayata goduru wi sitima nisa 1972 wasaredi wana saththwa saha thurulatha aarakshaka aagnya panatha yatathe nithigatha kala paridi kasbawun nithiyen aaraksha kirimata katayuthu kara athath digin digatama kasba dadayama siduwima mahath kanagatudayaka thaththwayak bawata pathwi hamaraya.
ee wagema me chithrapataya hindiyen, damila basin menma malayalam yana bhasha walin da handakawa pradarshanaya kara thibenawa.
ara porath nipunatha shilpayak karanawa kiwwa nisayi mama baluwe aspayo padinawada kiyala...
ee nisama thama ma obata nidahase uththara liyanne.
pinthuraya ekalas kirimedi ee ee leyara wala anupiliwela pinthuraya wadath pahasu ha sumata lesa ek kirimata aadharawana paridi wenas kara ganimath awashya wunoth karanna wewi.
sithagatha nohaki wegayakin pera paridima parikshaka mahathun ape madiriya pasukara yana wita eewa pirisidu wi thibuni.
awanka aadarayak wagema lassana hithak thiyena hawulkariyak jiwitheta lan karagaththoth jiwithema lassana wenawa.
menna karanaya….obata mema medaya nathi kirime athpotha kothanakawath miladi gatha nohaka.
thaththata ahuunoth kasat pis eka witharak neme mage wok man ekath kadala danawa.
sandaru umbaata yaluwange law sin walata udaw karanna gihin apalayi wage ....
nadira ee wargaye kanthawan gana noliwwe ee hinda wennath athi bohowita...
udarata, pahatharata sinhala bhashawa men ekin ekata prathiwiruddha bhasha wilasayaki.
eya sirure ushnathwaya pawathwa gena yamatada upakara wannak.
nithimaya washayen rata palanaya kirima rate sthawarathwaya sahathika kirime aniwarya kriyamargayak bawa chinaya sandahan karanawa.
mama kiyala dunna hamadenama sathuten sitiyoth thamayi hama deyakma paladayi wenne kiyala.
ehi wyawasthanukulabhawaya piligani awasan.
miyagiya ayata balithowil, pudapuja wenuwata pin dima kriyathmaka wuye yana budu wadanata anuwa mahinda gamanayen pasuwa ya.

jathyanthara balawega paththen gathwitadi eya itha labhadayi eka`gathawayaki.

ganika wruththiya kiyanne thawath eka rassawak ...
anith athata me salasume maha molakaruwa aanduwema kenakudayi kiyalath saka hithanna wenawa.”

bolgoda [2016-07-24] saththis bodhipakshika dharma purna kara ganimata upakara wana karunu kipayak gana*aayathana - anariya paryeshanaya * indriya - ariya pariyeshanaya *indriya dharma samanga mathuwana bala dharma *anynyathawi indriya *pranayama aana pana bhawanawa saha anariya dhyana*aanapana sathi bhawanawa - magapala labima samanga nibbana *keles wenkota handunaganne keseda *ghana sangnyawa - mama atha - mama natha yanna gana *siyalu aramunu iwath kirima niwanada*wanyachaka dharma saha bojjanga dharma *chathuariya sachchaye thipariwattaya gana* 2016 asala poya (pa.wa.) buddha shakthiyata anugathawima pilibanda ** charabawa saha thala 31 gana** aananthariya kusala dhamma yanu * aasawa saha anusaya saha nanusethi pilibandawa ** patiwirathohothi silaya **dittincha anupagammasilawa dassanena sanpanno saha sothapaththiyata path wima **warna - gandha - rasa - ooja - yannehi warna yanu **arupa raga - arupa dhyana - suddhawasa wala upatha labana aya gana ** magapala prakasha kalayuthu awastha monawada** mamayanaya saha wedana gana wigrahayak ** dwa sangnyawa gana** suthradeshana saha yahapath lesa pawathma genayama **karaniya dhamma - yonisomanasikaraya saha dhammanudhamma patipadawa ** awakasha -wignygnyana - saha cha dhathu wibhanga wigrahaya gana 2016 asala poya (pe.wa.) pariyapthi dharmaya - abhidharmaya saha prakarana gana ** dukkha ariya sachcha wigrahaye "pi" yana akurehi arutha ** buddha deshanawa pariwarthanaya kirima nisa niwana wasiyama gana saha artha, dharma, nirukthi, patisanbhida sahithawa deshana kala haki magadhi basa gana** anaththa - wiparinama dhamma - asmi manaya saha thrilakkhanaya **wemaththathawaya ha panchaskanda upadanaya ** magapala labima saha prathyaweksha gnyana ** aaswada- sukha saha aaswada duka .....ariya daham deshanawa saha sakachchawa 288.

hitapu widesha amathya lakshman kadiragamar, parlimenthu manthri joshap pararajasinham ha sama mahalekam karyala niyojya pradhani kethishwaran loganathan yana ghathanayan pilibanda mema komisama parikshana pawathwanu labana athara pasugiya kalaye siduwu digampathana nirayudha nawika sebalun ghathanaya, muththur sahana sewakayin dahahathdenage ghathanaya athulu siddhin pilibandawa da parikshana kirima sandaha mema komisamata balaya pawara di atha.
